official_title: Evaluation of Liver MR with an Abbreviated Gadobenate Dimeglumine Hepatobiliary Phase Protocol in Comparison to Liver MR with Gadoxetate Disodium for the Detection of Hepatic Metastases
inclusion_criteria:
* Colorectal cancer patients
* Age 18-80 years
* No prior treatment including surgery
* Prior imaging with suspected liver metastasis
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Age < 18 years or > 80 years
* eGFR < 30 ml/min/1.73 m2
* Previous reaction to gadolinium contrast agents
* History of claustrophobia or movement disorders likely to impact image quality
* Non-MR safe implants or metallic foreign bodies
